title: 帮忙看一下，崩溃了
author: asdfsh
txt_content:
每次创造世界就崩，请看一下为什么，一进去过不到3秒也崩，logs也放里面了
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Shall we play a game?


Time: 2020-07-25 09:13:03 CST
Description: Exception ticking world


java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4

replies.author: asdfsh
replies.txt_content: 已自行解决，删除了热力膨胀、热力基础已及4个热力前置，游戏能正常运行
